title: Victor Wembanyama Has Always Done Things Differently
description: Wembanyama, an 18-year-old with an eight-foot wingspan, will almost certainly be the top pick in next year’s N.B.A. draft. He’s been preparing for the moment for years.
dc:creator: Tania Ganguli and James Hill
media:credit: James Hill for The New York Times
media:description: Victor Wembanyama, a rising French basketball star, isn’t like anyone else. He’s 7-foot-3, but he’s as smooth as a smaller guard like Stephen Curry.
